Hi Cindy, 
I have included a few different RFPs related to IT services that are on the Knowledge Network below. If you have any further or more specific questions feel free to either change your question or ask a new one. 
-Here are some examples of how you can assess RFPs for IT services http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/22331
-Here are some general best practices for writing RFPs to help you out http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302081/Best_Practices_for_RFPs
-Informational Technology Master Plan and Overview http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6096/RFP_Information_Technology_Master_Plan_and_Operational_Review
-RFP for Local Government Software and Services Implementation http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302077/RFP_Local_Government_Software_and_Implementation_Services
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Cindy Foster
text: Elizabethtown Borough, Lancaster County, PA is considering contracting for IT services. We currently have one staff member who handles IT in addition to her other duties.  Relying on one person is a cause of concern in times when she is out on leave or at training events.  I am looking for sample rfp's that other municipalities have used to seek similar proposals.  Any help would be most appreciated!  --Cindy
title: RFP for IT Services
